venue.address_1: The riverside plaza across from market basket 11 kimball drive suit 124
venue.name: The NH Dog Company

item.description: Lets get ready for summer and have a bbq! I'm sure our pugs will love that idea! We will be grilling up some hamburgers and hotdogs...veggie burgers and veggie dogs too.... You can bring a dish or a snack if you would like ..we will also provide coffee,soda and i'm sure a special over 21+ drink.. and because we have so many new faces we will be updating the meetup photo for the page....i will also be having a summer costume contest for the pups so if you have some summer digs for your pup bring them along : ) The categories will be best summer t shirt , best doggie bathing suit, and best summer outfit... This should be a good time and a nice way to welcome summer in...  Just added we will be holding a few raffles to benefit green mountain pug rescue  with 100% of all proceeds going to green mountain pug rescue...so bring a few bucks with you if you can and you may even win a prize!  I will be selling raffles tickets for $1 a piece

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: kick off to summer party!
